## subset() function

A function that will return a subset of a given object keeping only the attributes that it contains.

The original object is not affected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function subset(obj: object, attrs: string[]): object;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | object | Object to create a subset for. |
|  attrs | string\[\] | The attributes to retain in the object. |

<b>Returns:</b>

object
